flextable package
  • Introduction

  • Function reference

Calculate pretty dimensions

return minimum estimated widths and heights for each table columns and rows.

dim_pretty(x)

Examples


# get estimated widths
ft <- flextable(mtcars)
dim_pretty(ft)
#> $widths
#>       mpg       cyl      disp        hp      drat        wt      qsec        vs 
#> 0.4988788 0.4216354 0.5761221 0.5761221 0.4216354 0.4216354 0.4988788 0.4216354 
#>        am      gear      carb 
#> 0.4216354 0.4216354 0.4216354 
#> 
#> $heights
#>  [1] 0.2027226 0.1756637 0.1756637 0.1756637 0.1756637 0.1756637 0.1756637
#>  [8] 0.1756637 0.1756637 0.1756637 0.1756637 0.1756637 0.1756637 0.1756637
#> [15] 0.1756637 0.1756637 0.1756637 0.1756637 0.1756637 0.1756637 0.1756637
#> [22] 0.1756637 0.1756637 0.1756637 0.1756637 0.1756637 0.1756637 0.1756637
#> [29] 0.1756637 0.1756637 0.1756637 0.1756637 0.1755959
#> 
#>
